summary: Light sand-like background color scheme with miscellaneous dark grains
name: sand
description:
GUI only colorscheme.
I created it some time ago when I found no light colorscheme that I like at vim.sf.net
Now there are some, but I still like this one. So I decided to put it here.

Look at http://sunsite.cs.msu.su/~tim/vim/index.html It shows this scheme in work :) 
This page was generated with syntax/2html.vim script.
install_details:
Save the file as "colors/sand.vim" under 'runtimepath'. I.e. as ~/.vim/colors/sand.vim under Unix.
And use it with  :color sand. Change color to sand in your .vimrc/.gvimrc if you like it.
